page.title: 12Cost of a House
page.content: {WENDENS AMBO}High-quality modern detached House,pleasant situation.Oil central heating,hall,cloakroom,superb sitting room,dining room,well fitted kitchen,4 bedrooms,one with en suite bathroom,second bathroom;integral double garage,good size attractive garden {Â£82,000 } {ARKESDEN} An outstanding Detached 17th century period cottage.Three reception rooms,kitchen/breakfast room,cloakroom ,study or 4th bedroom,3 further bedrooms,full cental heating;detatched garage,lovely large garden with summerhouse,etc. Beautiful situation in this sought after village. Offers in the region of Â£102,500 {Even small houses cost Â£35,000 -it is {an expensive area because of the ease {of commuting to London. Source - Local Papers
